[00:09.56]Couple of a jar stamps got her
[00:11.39]Hand looking like a rainbow
[00:13.92]In and out of every bar
[00:15.33]
[00:15.87]On a when just like the wind blows
[00:18.50]She's either a bachelorette or coming off a breakup
[00:22.20]
[00:24.00]Take a drunk girl home
[00:25.30]
[00:27.32]She's bouncing like a pinball
[00:29.47]Singing every word she never knew
[00:31.75]Dancing with her eyes closed like
[00:33.95]She's the only one in the room
[00:36.27]But here's a perfect mess falling out of that dress
[00:39.67]
[00:41.68]Take a drunk girl home
[00:43.05]
[00:43.72]Take a drunk girl home
[00:45.48]
[00:46.01]Let her sleep all alone
[00:47.45]
[00:48.17]Leave her keys on the counter your number by the phone
[00:51.87]
[00:52.42]Pick up her life she threw on the floor
[00:56.90]Leave the hall lights on walk out and lock the door
[01:00.33]
[01:01.50]That's how she knows the difference between a boy and man
[01:04.97]
[01:05.95]Take a drunk girl home
[01:07.41]
[01:11.22]You leave her dry for a die
[01:12.93]You get something bad to eat
[01:15.12]
[01:15.69]They're singing closing time at that little bar across the street
[01:19.35]
[01:20.18]Then two by two strangers in love
[01:22.13]Who's headed for the covers hooking up
[01:24.90]
[01:28.21]That TV in your two bedroom sounds turned off
[01:32.52]
[01:33.05]Through the paper thin walls
[01:34.91]You can hear the neighbor's cigarette cough
[01:37.39]There's a million things you could be doing
[01:39.96]But there's one thing you're damn sure glad you did
[01:43.84]
[01:44.66]Take a drunk girl home
[01:46.84]
[01:47.45]Let her sleep all alone
[01:48.92]
[01:49.55]Leave her keys on the counter your number by the phone
[01:53.62]Pick up her life she threw on the floor
[01:58.00]Leave the hall lights on walk out and lock the door
[02:01.69]
[02:02.76]That's how you know the difference between a boy and man
[02:06.23]
[02:06.92]Take a drunk girl home
[02:08.40]
[02:20.41]You took a drunk girl home
[02:21.84]
[02:22.44]In the sober light of dawn
[02:23.92]
[02:24.52]She left you a message she thinks you're on the phone
[02:28.07]

[02:32.97]You left the hall lights on walked out and lock the door

[00:00.00]以下歌词翻译由微信翻译提供
[00:04.78]//
[00:09.56]几罐邮票让她心满意足
[00:11.39]手就像彩虹
[00:13.92]在每个酒吧进进出出
[00:15.33]
[00:15.87]在某个时候就像风一样
[00:18.50]她不是单身女郎就是刚刚分手
[00:22.20]
[00:24.00]带一个喝醉的女孩回家
[00:25.30]
[00:27.32]她像弹球一样蹦蹦跳跳
[00:29.47]唱着她从未听过的每一句话
[00:31.75]她闭着眼睛翩翩起舞
[00:33.95]房间里只有她一个人
[00:36.27]可这裙子让我变得狼狈不堪
[00:39.67]
[00:41.68]带一个喝醉的女孩回家
[00:43.05]
[00:43.72]带一个喝醉的女孩回家
[00:45.48]
[00:46.01]让她独自入睡
[00:47.45]
[00:48.17]把她的钥匙放在柜台上电话旁是你的电话号码
[00:51.87]
[00:52.42]重拾她丢弃在地上的生活
[00:56.90]让大厅的灯亮着走出去锁上门
[01:00.33]
[01:01.50]所以她知道男孩和男人的区别
[01:04.97]
[01:05.95]带一个喝醉的女孩回家
[01:07.41]
[01:11.22]你让她自生自灭
[01:12.93]你吃了难吃的东西
[01:15.12]
[01:15.69]他们在街对面的小酒吧唱着打烊的歌
[01:19.35]
[01:20.18]然后两个相爱的陌生人
[01:22.13]谁会来到被窝里寻欢作乐
[01:24.90]
[01:28.21]你卧室里的电视机好像关掉了
[01:32.52]
[01:33.05]透过薄薄的墙壁
[01:34.91]你可以听到邻居抽烟咳嗽的声音
[01:37.39]你可以做一百万件事
[01:39.96]但有一件事你肯定很高兴你做到了
[01:43.84]
[01:44.66]带一个喝醉的女孩回家
[01:46.84]
[01:47.45]让她独自入睡
[01:48.92]
[01:49.55]把她的钥匙放在柜台上电话旁是你的电话号码
[01:53.62]重拾她丢弃在地上的生活
[01:58.00]让大厅的灯亮着走出去锁上门
[02:01.69]
[02:02.76]这就是你如何分辨男孩和男人的区别
[02:06.23]
[02:06.92]带一个喝醉的女孩回家
[02:08.40]
[02:20.41]你带一个喝醉的女孩回家
[02:21.84]
[02:22.44]在黎明的曙光中
[02:23.92]
[02:24.52]她给你留言她以为你在打电话
[02:28.07]
[02:28.68]因为你让她的生命支离破碎
[02:32.97]你让大厅的灯亮着走出去锁上门
[02:36.87]
[02:37.69]所以她知道男孩和男人的区别
